entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
